docs.text:
Welcome to the Zandercraft Bot Documentation!


About Zandercraft Bot


The Zandercraft Bot is a Discord bot that was based off of WildBeast (a Discord bot by 
TheSharks
).  Zandercraft Bot is a chat, productivity, GIFs, and fun bot. It's main feature is it's ability to play XHD (extra HD). This feature is activated using the +voice command followed by +request {song name}. It also has commands like +snack where the bot returns some food emojis which then you can do +eat to pretend to eat them. Since the Zandercraft bot is built for customizability, you are able to set a server specific prefix, custom messages for when someone tries to run a command that they are not allowed to use, a custom welcome message to welcome new members to your server via PMs, and whether or not to allow potentially NSFW memes in specific channels. The Zandercraft Bot is hosted on our servers up here in Canada.
Make sure to check out our website at 
zandercraft.cf
 for some extra information.


About Us


The Zandercraft Bot developer team includes 
Zander
, 
ShadeyG
, and 
Dragon
. The Zandercraft Bot dev team invites you all to join 
our official Discord Server
 to ask any questions about the bot, get the latest news about the bot, or to just listen to music, look at memes, or hang out and game with us.


Features




Music from YouTube and SoundCloud


Funny Insults


Meme generator


Moderation Commands


Useful Advice


Comics


Welcome Messages


Server Info


User Info


Role Management


Customizability


Compatible with both Windows and Linux




Invite The Zandercraft Bot To Your Discord Server


Click 
here
 to invite the Zandercraft Bot to your Discord server.
